meanings.definition: Excluding or not admitting other things.
meanings.sent1: The exclusive club only allowed members with special invitations.
meanings.sent2: The exclusive event was reserved for VIP guests only.
meanings.sent3: The exclusive party had a strict guest list, no gatecrashers allowed!
meanings.sent4: Her exclusive focus on the project led to its successful completion.
meanings.sent5: The exclusive offer was too good to pass up.

meanings.definition: Restricted or limited to a specific person, group, or area.
meanings.sent1: The exclusive parking spots were reserved for employees only.
meanings.sent2: The exclusive access code was known only to a few individuals.
meanings.sent3: The exclusive seating arrangement caused confusion among the guests.
meanings.sent4: His exclusive knowledge of the subject impressed everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The exclusive area of the museum housed rare artifacts.

meanings.definition: Not shared with others; unique or only available to a select few.
meanings.sent1: The exclusive rights to the invention belonged to the inventor.
meanings.sent2: The exclusive product launch was a huge success.
meanings.sent3: The exclusive recipe was a closely guarded secret in the family.
meanings.sent4: Her exclusive collection of vintage cars was the envy of many.
meanings.sent5: The exclusive opportunity to meet the celebrity was a dream come true.
